data.message: Help - projection rebuild stuck at 82% for 3 hours. Production system, somewhat urgent.
data.name: Anthony Brown

data.message: What's your maximum event store size for a single tenant? We're looking at processing around 500k events per day and want to understand storage implications and performance characteristics at scale.
data.name: Anthony Wright

data.message: Love the performance so far. We've processed over 2M events in the first week without any hiccups. The Rust backend really shines - our p99 latency is consistently under 50ms even during peak loads. Great work on the event sourcing implementation.
data.name: Oscar Thomas

data.message: When can we schedule the demo?
data.name: Brian Wilson

data.message: Quick question - SSO support?
data.name: Yan Zhu

data.message: Simple question: how do I configure SSO?
data.name: Jian Zhou

data.message: UI needs work but functionality is there.
data.name: Paul Klein

data.message: Looking for a demo this week if possible
data.name: Ronald Lee

data.message: Disappointed with the recent outage. 4 hours of downtime impacted our APAC operations significantly. Need better communication during incidents.
data.name: Ella Schmidt

data.message: We're considering migrating from a traditional CRUD system to event sourcing. Could you explain your approach to maintaining consistency between different views and how you handle race conditions? Also interested in your strategy for rebuilding projections without downtime.
data.name: Michelle Jones

data.message: Rust build times?
data.name: Alice Roux

data.message: Working well for our team of 50. Clean interface, good performance.
data.name: Thomas Scott

data.message: Looking at the technical architecture - can you explain how you're using tokio for async operations, particularly around database interactions? What led you to choose Rust over Go or Node for this, and how has it impacted system reliability?
data.name: Yuto Kobayashi

data.message: Are there plans for AI/ML features in the roadmap?
data.name: Joshua Rodriguez

data.message: We're seeing massive latency spikes during peak hours (>2s response times). System was fine last week. Running latest version, no recent changes on our end. Need assistance identifying the bottleneck. Attached metrics and logs.
data.name: Alice Martin

data.message: How do you handle schema migrations when the event structure needs to change? Particularly interested in backward compatibility and your versioning strategy for long-lived events.
data.name: Michael Johnson

data.message: Webhook configs?
data.name: Léa Richard

data.message: Our dev team is primarily JavaScript focused. What's the learning curve like for your system? Do we need Rust knowledge for customizations or is everything available through a higher-level API?
data.name: Alice Dubois

data.message: Performance numbers for concurrent users?
data.name: Timothy Baker

data.message: Hi, interested in seeing how your CRM handles custom fields
data.name: John Martinez

data.message: Lost connection to event store.
data.name: George Jackson

data.message: Could you deep dive into your CQRS implementation? Specifically interested in how you handle eventual consistency in the UI, your approach to read models, and how you optimize for different query patterns.
data.name: Kathleen Allen

data.message: Event replay performance is incredible compared to our previous solution. Migration was smooth, documentation is excellent, and the support team really knows their stuff. Particularly impressed with the projection rebuild speeds.
data.name: Linda Perez

data.message: Some bugs in search.
data.name: Daniel Flores

data.message: Enterprise pricing?
data.name: George Roberts

data.message: We're processing sensitive healthcare data - can you detail your encryption approach both at rest and in transit? Also interested in your audit logging capabilities and compliance certifications.
data.name: Kathleen Scott

data.message: Mobile app when?
data.name: Louise Michel

data.message: The system has transformed our operations. Audit logging is comprehensive, GDPR compliance features work as advertised, and the event sourcing patterns have given us insights we never had before. Worth every penny.
data.name: Muhammad Jones

data.message: Need integration with Salesforce - is this possible?
data.name: David Adams

data.message: Hi, we're a mid-sized manufacturing company looking to upgrade our CRM. Main pain points are lead tracking and sales pipeline visibility. We have about 200 employees across 3 locations, with 50 in sales.
data.name: Haruto Yamamoto

data.message: Quick question - does your system support multiple languages?
data.name: Rebecca Jackson

data.message: How are you handling projection rebuilds at scale? We've had issues with previous event-sourced systems where rebuilding views would take days. What's your approach to optimization here?
data.name: Nancy Lee

data.message: Support for PostgreSQL?
data.name: Mila Müller

data.message: Can you walk through your conflict resolution strategy? Particularly interested in how you handle concurrent edits in offline-first scenarios and your approach to CRDTs if you're using them.
data.name: Amanda Baker

data.message: What's the backup strategy and RTO/RPO?
data.name: Mei Yang

data.message: How do you approach testing, particularly around event sourcing logic? Do you provide tools for testing projections and event handlers? What about integration testing support?
data.name: Na Zhu

data.message: Local dev setup requirements?
data.name: Olivia Jones

data.message: We're looking at implementing complex workflows with compensating actions. How does your system handle saga patterns and distributed transactions? What happens when part of a workflow fails?
data.name: Kevin Hill

data.message: Can you show us the reporting features?
data.name: Ying Liu

data.message: Meh, expected more features.
data.name: Laura Williams

data.message: Complex setup process, took us 2 weeks to get everything configured properly. Once running though, it's been rock solid. Haven't had a single production incident in 3 months.
data.name: Mei Lin

data.message: Having issues with the event schema migration. The documentation mentions using the CLI tool, but we're getting version mismatch errors. Need urgent help as this is blocking our deployment.
data.name: David Davis

data.message: API docs location?
data.name: Nancy Sanchez

data.message: How are you handling data partitioning and sharding? We're dealing with multi-tenant scenarios and need to understand your approach to data isolation and performance optimization per tenant.
data.name: Karen Wilson

data.message: How to add custom fields?
data.name: Hui Zhao

data.message: Basic but reliable.
data.name: Amanda Hall

data.message: Urgent demo needed
data.name: George Walker

data.message: Do you handle custom aggregate types?
data.name: Emma Simon

data.message: Integration was a nightmare. Your SDK documentation is outdated, support was unresponsive, and we had to figure out most things ourselves. Not what we expected given the premium pricing.
data.name: Leo Davies

data.message: Storage engine details? We're particularly interested in any optimizations you've made for event storage and retrieval patterns.
data.name: Brian Brown

data.message: Does the job.
data.name: Paul Schneider

data.message: Export options for compliance?
data.name: Mio Tanaka

data.message: Following up on demo request
data.name: Noah Klein

data.message: How are you handling event serialization? Looking to understand the performance implications of different payload sizes and your approach to compression if any.
data.name: Jason Allen

data.message: Browser compatibility list?
data.name: Leon Fischer

data.message: Running an e-commerce business with high transaction volume. Need to see how your CRM handles customer service integration, especially regarding order history and returns processing.
data.name: Yan Zhou

data.message: Our event store size grew exponentially overnight. Seeing lots of duplicate events and the system is barely responsive. Need immediate assistance investigating the cause. This is affecting our production environment.
data.name: Joseph Lee

data.message: Password reset not working.
data.name: Isla Roberts

data.message: Really impressed with the thought that went into the CQRS implementation. The separation of read and write models has given us incredible flexibility in optimizing our query patterns. Also appreciate the thorough approach to handling eventual consistency in the UI.
data.name: Emma Weber

data.message: Could you share some insights into your use of WASM? We're especially interested in any client-side processing you're offloading and the performance benefits you're seeing.
data.name: Ming Wang

data.message: Monthly active user limits?
data.name: Lisa Perez

data.message: Been trying to set up the development environment for 2 days now. The Docker compose setup fails with cryptic Rust compilation errors. Any guidance would be appreciated.
data.name: Max Bauer

data.message: What's your approach to domain modeling in an event-sourced system? Do you provide any tooling or frameworks to help teams design their event streams and aggregates?
data.name: Xiao Wu

data.message: Too expensive for what it offers.
data.name: Isabella Robinson

data.message: Integration with Salesforce?
data.name: Ava Evans

data.message: How do you handle system evolution over time? Particularly interested in strategies for deprecating old events and managing technical debt in long-running event streams.
data.name: Sakura Tanaka

data.message: White labeling possible?
data.name: Jeffrey Thomas

data.message: Can't connect to API.
data.name: Rosie Walker

data.message: Critical: Lost data during node failover. Seeing gaps in our event stream between 2:00 AM and 4:00 AM UTC. Need urgent assistance with recovery options. This is affecting financial transactions.
data.name: Jeffrey Garcia

data.message: I'm interested in your loyalty program features and automated customer communications.
data.name: Yu Zhu

data.message: We need API access - can you show this in the demo?
data.name: Nancy Williams

data.message: Is mobile access included?
data.name: Karen Nguyen

data.message: Started using this last quarter. Mixed feelings overall. Event sourcing is powerful but the learning curve was steeper than advertised. Would appreciate more examples and better tooling around debugging event streams.
data.name: Helen Thomas

data.message: Needs better reporting.
data.name: Sharon Baker

data.message: We're running a high-throughput trading system - what's your maximum message processing rate and how do you handle back pressure?
data.name: Mia Williams

data.message: Fantastic developer experience. The Rust backend is blazing fast, error handling is comprehensive, and the event store design shows real attention to detail. Minor UI quirks but nothing dealbreaking.
data.name: John Miller

data.message: Real estate team here. We need advanced document management and e-signature capabilities. Mobile access is crucial as our agents are always on the go. Would love to see how your system handles property listings and client matching. Calendar integration is also important.
data.name: Sakura Suzuki

data.message: OK for basic use cases.
data.name: Mia Johnson

data.message: Custom field limitations?
data.name: Mei Yang

data.message: Teams of 50+ users - need enterprise features demo
data.name: Rebecca Taylor

data.message: Three months in and still discovering bugs. Latest one corrupted our projection store during a high-load period. Recovery took hours. Seriously reconsidering our choice.
data.name: William Adams

data.message: Could you elaborate on your snapshot strategy? Specifically interested in your approach to determining snapshot frequency and handling snapshot storage at scale.
data.name: Jennifer Ramirez

data.message: Can we see the email marketing integration?
data.name: Timothy Thomas

data.message: How to delete a user?
data.name: Elizabeth White

data.message: API throttling limits?
data.name: Leo Robinson

data.message: Looking to migrate from HubSpot - need to see comparable features
data.name: Jules Leroy

data.message: Good performance, lacking features.
data.name: Lina Richter

data.message: How do you approach debugging in production? What tools do you provide for tracing event flows and understanding system behavior?
data.name: Yuna Nakamura

data.message: Interested in automation capabilities
data.name: Michelle Nguyen

data.message: Perfect fit for our healthcare compliance requirements. The audit trails are comprehensive and the encryption implementation is solid. Support team was extremely helpful during our compliance audit.
data.name: Mia Roberts

data.message: Mobile app is buggy.
data.name: Yi Deng

data.message: The projection rebuilding process is consuming all available RAM and crashing our production instance. Need immediate guidance on configuration optimization.
data.name: Jun Wang

data.message: Mobile app keeps crashing.
data.name: Sarah Hall

data.message: Major requirements: project management integration, time tracking, and easy client portal access. Any chance you could show us the client collaboration features?
data.name: Hao Xu

data.message: ASAP please
data.name: Kevin Hill

data.message: Scaling issues after 10M events.
data.name: Hugo Robert

data.message: We've hit some kind of rate limit but can't find any documentation about limits. Getting 429 errors every few minutes. Need this resolved ASAP as it's affecting customer operations.
data.name: Henry Johnson

data.message: Initial setup was rough but worth it. System has been running flawlessly for 6 months now. Projection rebuilds are fast, event store is efficient, and the UI is snappy. Development team loves the clear separation of concerns.
data.name: Jessica Lee

data.message: Language support for SDK?
data.name: Jeffrey Lee

data.message: Where's the GraphQL support?
data.name: Ming Zhao
